attributes.action: consider remove VAT on feminine hygene products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
value added tax was initially introduced for luxury items.
I do not see femine hygene as a luxury.
This tax on hygene products that all females must use i see as a discrimenatory tax on being female.
I theirfore believe that "all" feminine hygene products should be zero rated.
By hygene products i refer to tampons/sanitary towels and the like not eu de toilet sprays or perfumes.

rejection.details:
This has already been done. See
www.hm-treasury.gov.uk/budget/budget_2000/press_notices/bud_bud00_presssanitary.cfm
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
